column4: Ok. I know this is horrible. But I am at my wits end. I need some help, before I tear mye eyes out.

Is there anyone here willing to help me? A little information: I know very little about unbuntu, but have managed to install it correctly on my new notebook. But I cant get some of my functions to work.
Anyone? I cant find any help anywhere.
you haven't really asked your question yet.
